Script.create configmap: cd ${PROJECT_PATH};source build-script/config.env;envsubst < build-script/configmap-template.yml > configmap-template.yml;sed -i 's/^/    /g' src/main/resources/application.yml;cat configmap-template.yml src/main/resources/application.yml > im-service-gyyx-cn.yml
Script.build images: cd ${PROJECT_PATH};source build-script/config.env;docker build -f build-script/Dockerfile -t repo.gydev.cn:8082/${NAMESPACE}/${SERVICE_NAME}:${PROJECT_VERSION} .;docker push repo.gydev.cn:8082/${NAMESPACE}/${SERVICE_NAME}:${PROJECT_VERSION};docker rmi repo.gydev.cn:8082/${NAMESPACE}/${SERVICE_NAME}:${PROJECT_VERSION}
